flawed_nl_solution:
It takes her 2 hours to paint 1 picture and she needs to paint 12 pictures so it will take 2*12 = <<2*12=24>>24 hours
Dawn will make $3600.00 for 24 hours of work which means she makes 3600/24 = $510.00 per hour of work

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150.0, not 510.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
